summary: Also annoyed by missmatching colors of armor and other parts? Then this is for you.
descriptionHtml:
Matching Armor Parts HD

========================================================================================

For those who also can't stand armor and other parts to have missmatched colors, then this is for you. This will fix those colors so you got a matching armor set.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Other Mods and Files by me:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Download with Manager.
2) Activate Mod.
author: Lunyra

files.name: Matching Armor Parts HD
files.changelogHtml: Added Orcish Weapons and Sword Scabbard. (They were too green and didn\'t match the Armor.)
